body.p: This topic is intended for system administrators and integration developers that want to troubleshoot deployment or programming errors. If you are not in any of the previous categories, you would better contact your system administrator or use the Report problem action.

Oxygen Web Author intentionally does not provide explanatory messages for errors caused by deployment or programming mistakes. If you are trying to troubleshoot such a problem, you can find more information in the browser logs or in the server logs.

dlentry.dd: To see the browser logs one needs to open the Developer Tools of their browser. This can be usually achieved by pressing F12
In order to see the server logs, follow these instructions
